basics.name: Leighton Miguel
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a Bachelor in Information & Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

skills.name: DevOps & Cloud
keywords: AWS (App Runner, EC2, ECS, ECR, Lambda, S3)

work.company: University of Hawaii Economic Research Organization (UHERO)
highlights: Automated website deployment to organization staging and production servers with CI/CD pipelines using self-hosted GitHub Action runners, eliminating 20 minutes of manual update deployment time
Configured Red Hat Linux staging environments for three organization applications, enabling thorough pre-production testing and eliminating production deployment risk
Streamlined application build process by introducing Docker for containerized application runs, reducing build times by 40% and standardizing deployment across environments
Automated FTP server image uploading with the use of JavaScript and a server-side PHP script, enabling the upload of over 20 gigabytes of image assets
Implemented and launched three major version updates for the organization's mobile app using Expo, React Native, and a Firebase real-time database, contributing to over 1,000 downloads per semester
Integrated a new student information page within the app, assisting over 1,000 students during New Student Orientation
Refactored the mobile app's deals page, boosting user engagement and generating over $1,000 in company advertisement revenue
Architected an AI moderation system leveraging AWS API Gateway, Lambda, Rekognition, and Comprehend, moderating 100% of student chat and image-based interactions with AI
Developed and deployed AI Prompting Firebase functions with TypeScript, allowing chat and image prompting to AI models like GPT and Stable Diffusion for over 120 students
Modified and integrated an open-source Python Language Server package into a web-based code editor, streamlining coding education operations across four coding camps
Streamlined deployment processes by integrating CI/CD with Docker and GitHub Workflows, automating AWS EC2 and Lambda infrastructure deployment, and reducing 20+ manual deployment steps
Directed collaborative workflows using GitHub, overseeing issue tracking, branches, and pull requests, and orchestrating the integration of 500+ commits across multiple company projects
Integrated internal dashboards with the implementation of a RESTful API and the utilization of TypeScript, React, and Webpack, enabling the display and management of over 200 model data entries
Migrated company infrastructure to AWS and established automatic deployment pipelines with Docker and GitHub actions, increasing site performance speeds by over 75%
Contributed to the development of client service software utilizing Django, Python, and PostgreSQL, collaborating on the development of five distinct company applications
